definition: to bind over (as surety)/to sign an undertaking
tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)

sentences.english: He was bound over to keep the peace by magistrates.
sentences.chinese: 治安官命他具結保證不擾亂治安。

sentences.english: The magistrate bound him over to be of good behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 治安法官使他具結保證表現好。

sentences.english: Court verdict is the judgment verdict for the law cases of the ancient Chinese legislative officials.
sentences.chinese: 判詞是古代司法官員審理案件的具結文書。
